  • Method Details

    • oauthEndpoint

      @GetMapping("/discord") public java.lang.String oauthEndpoint​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Description copied from class: OauthController
      Mapping, that receives oauth server request to authorising an user.

      Every children class must call this method in the overridden method with annotation @GetMapping("/[provider]")

      Steps of authorising:

      1. Checks if state in request matches with state cookie in the client
      2. Gets code from the request via OauthController.receiveCode(HttpServletRequest)
      3. Sends request for receiving access token, using OauthController.receiveToken(String) with the code received in the previous step.
      4. Sends request for receiving unique user id, using OauthController.receiveId(String) with the access token received in the previous step.
      5. Attaches oauth id to the request and forwards to the AuthController.oauth(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse)
      Overrides:
      oauthEndpoint in class OauthController
      Parameters:
      request - contains code
      response - for deleting state cookie
      Returns:
      forward to AuthController.oauth(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) or to the home page, if error occurs while authorising
